column1: Uchi////-Bacon Otoshi ($6): I probably wouldn't get this again but it was interesting!  If you like pork belly
column2: def. get it though because the slices were very thick
column6: all that good stuff.  The kimchi on top was almost like pork rind consistency
column8: didn't taste like kimchi at all.  Textures were more interesting than the actual taste of the dish.
